title: Towards intelligent electric vehicle power batteries and multi-scenario application vehicle operation safety charging strategies: a review
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00291A, Review Article
Shan Li, Jian Ma, Xuan Zhao, Kai Zhang, Zhipeng Jiao, Qifan Xue
Herein, we introduce the characteristics of different charging strategies and their equalization control technologies based on battery cells and modules and present an overview of the charging mode of the whole vehicle in detail.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
